name: JioSafe
description: Ultra-secure voice and video calling app with end-to-end encryption, quantum-resistant security algorithms, and 5-level protection system for confidential communication on Jio 5G network

opengraph.title: Encrypted Calling App for Secure Voice and Video Calls | JioSafe
opengraph.description: Now make completely secure voice & video calls with JioSafe, a one-of-a-kind encrypted calling app. Learn more about the JioSafe calling app and its features here.
